  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:GSG_5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>GSG_5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Effective ways of displaying information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wirkungsvolle Methoden der Displayinformation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voies pertinentes d'information d'affichage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maneiras eficazes da informação indicando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modi efficaci delle informazioni di 
visualizzazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποτελεσματικοί τρόποι τις πληροφορίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Maneras eficaces de la información que visualiza</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">The power of graphics should not the underestimated. They can express information clearly and simply. This unit will help you to assess which style of graphic to use in different situations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Business and Management</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Charts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Diagrams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Graphs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">matrices</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Energie der Graphiken sollte nicht 
unterschätzt. Sie können Informationen offenbar und einfach 
ausdrücken. Diese Maßeinheit hilft Ihnen festzusetzen, das Art
in den unterschiedlichen Situationen zu verwenden der Graphik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La puissance des graphiques ne devrait pas 
sous-estimés. Ils peuvent exprimer l'information clairement et 
simplement. Cette unité vous aidera à évaluer qui modèle du 
graphique à utiliser dans différentes situations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A potência dos gráficos não deve 
underestimated. Podem expressar a informação claramente e 
simplesmente. Esta unidade ajudar-lhe-á avaliar que estilo do 
gráfico a se usar em situações diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'potenza dei grafici non dovrebbe sottovalutati. 
Possono esprimere chiaramente e semplicemente le informazioni. 
Questa unità li aiuterà a valutare che stile del grafico da 
usare nelle situazioni differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δύναμη της γραφικής παράστασης εάν υποτιμημένη. 
Μπορούν να εκφράσουν τις πληροφορίες σαφώς και απλά. 
Αυτή η μονάδα θα σας βοηθήσει για να αξιολογήσει ποιο ύφος 
γραφικού στη χρήση στις διαφορετικές καταστάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La potencia de los gráficos no debe subestimados.
Pueden expresar la información claramente y simplemente. 
Esta unidad le ayudará a evaluar que estilo del gráfico a 
utilizar en diversas situaciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft und Management</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramme</string>
          </keyword>
